result.title: EU/US CPS roadmap (final version)
result.description: This final version of the EU/US CPS roadmap contains an update of the preliminary version T3.1 including an analysis of the state of R&D on CPS in the EU and the US, identification of commonalities and differences, and identified opportunities for R&D cooperations between the EU and the US. In addition, it also contains the roadmap towards a joint EU/US strategy for CPS as worked out in the second CPS Summit workshop including proposals for concrete R&T initiatives, a proposition of a sustainable strategy, and a proposition of concrete actions for implementation.
